examples.example: 她一面哼着歌，一面快乐地做着家务。

translate.english: She hums a song while happily doing the household chores.

examples.example: 他一面努力工作，一面积极提升自己的能力。

translate.english: He works hard while actively improving his own abilities.

examples.example: 他一面认真听讲，一面仔细做笔记。

translate.english: He listens carefully while taking notes carefully at the same time.
